content: gentle striping brings out an interesting geometric grid pattern on this shawl featuring a breezy open stitch design you ll stitch basic crochet single_crochet and chain to complete this very wearable all-season layer of style you ll love how easy it is to achieve the colorful effect with the self-striping quality of caron skinny cakes we ve used a neutral palette but you can create a version with more pop by selecting a brighter shade of yarn it s a perfect gift to surprise a fashion maven
